alert.note: Alert for Huerfano; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 1:24PM MDT until June 17 at 2:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Huerfano County in southeastern Colorado... Southeastern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 215 PM MDT. * At 124 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles south of Salt Creek to 20 miles south of Blende to 16 miles north of Walsenburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Huerfano and southeastern Pueblo Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
